cast.name: 皮埃尔·波克玛 Pierre Bokma
马塞尔·亨瑟玛 Marcel Hensema
埃尔希·德·布劳 Elsie de Brauw
格尼欧·德·格鲁特 Genio De Groot
雅普·斯派克斯 Jaap Spijkers
马菲积斯·范德桑德·巴库曾 Matthijs van de Sande Bakhuyzen
扬容·斯皮森伯格 Jeroen Spitzenberger
吉斯·舒尔腾·范·艾查特 Gijs Scholten van Aschat

director.name: Willem van de Sande Bakhuyzen Willem van de Sande Bakhuyzen

introduction: The relationship of four old college friends in trouble is renewed when they get dependent on each other. Pieter doesn't want to give back eight valuable paintings he took from the art depot of the municipality for each year as a birthday present. To help him, he requests the help from Tom, once a lawyer, but now a drug addict. Politician Joep, quarrelling with his wife and in the race for becoming a member of the Dutch cabinet, is hiding at Pieter's place. Joep's daughter is actress in a play of stage director Maarten. Secretly Maarten is having sex with her and he is looking for an opportunity to tell. For some time the friendship of the four is revived, but are they willing to go through fire and water for one another?
